meanings: (쓰레기 등을) throw away, throw out, dump, (informal) junk
(포기하다, 떠나다) desert, leave, abandon, (literary) forsake, give up

phrases.phrase: 당신은 달아나버린 상대를 언제까지고 생각하는 타입이 아닙니다.
meanings: B형에 관련된 표현 You are not the kind who is always thinking about someone who left you.
